Quick search

Enter search terms or a module, class or function name.

colors¶

hex RGB colors and related functions

colors.rgb_to_hex(rgb)[source]¶
Parameters:rgb – tuple (r,g,b) of 3 ints 0-255
Result:string “#rrggbb” in hex suitable for HTML color
colors.hex_to_rgb(value, scale=1)[source]¶
Parameters:
  • value – string “#rrggbb” in hex suitable for HTML color
  • scale – float optional 1./255 to scale output to [0,1] floats
Result:

tuple (r,g,b) of 3 ints 0-255
colors.color_range(n, start, end)[source]¶
Parameters:
  • n – int number of colors to generate
  • start – string hex color or color name
  • end – string hex color or color name
Result:

list of n hexcolors interpolated between start and end, included
